data.title: THE WANDERER by Peter Van den Ende is a “mind-blowing debut” according to Kirkus Review. ★ “Marvelously engrossing—a triumph.” —Kirkus...
data.meta_description:
30 likes, 1 comments - levinequerido on December 27, 2021: "THE WANDERER by Peter Van den Ende is a “mind-blowing debut” according to Kirkus Review.

★ “Marvelously engrossing—a triumph.” —Kirkus

There are no words as we follow a little paper boat’s phantasmagoric voyage across the world’s waterways with weird and wonderful creatures and awe-inspiring natural phenomena. 

The imaginative and immersive journey, intricately rendered with Escher-like precision, won Van den Ende the Dilys Evans Founder’s Award from the Society of Illustrators.

★ “Remarkable. Absolutely sui generis.”—Booklist

#TheWanderer, named Best Children's Book of 2020 by the New York Times and Best Book of 2020 by the Wall Street Journal, will inspire readers young and old. 

At times we may feel fragile and adrift as we traverse life’s up and downs, but we too can be brave among the waves and face the challenges that come. 

#bookstagram #kidsbookstagram
#diversifyyourbookshelf #readtheworld with #LevineQuerido #authorillustrator @petervandenende8 
#fantasy #paperboat #adventures
#penandink
#childrenspicturebooks.".
